<script src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.8.0/jquery.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="http://code.jquery.com/ui/1.8.24/jquery-ui.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>			
<script type="text/javascript">
    
    var alldiv = $('#hometestimonials').find('div');
    var curdiv=0;
    function runEffect(k) {
			// get effect type from 
			var selectedEffect = "blind";
			// most effect types need no options passed by default
			var options = { percent: 100 };
			
			$( alldiv[k] ).show( selectedEffect, options, 500, callback );
    };
    //callback function to bring a hidden box back
		function callback() {
			setTimeout(function() {
			    var olddiv=curdiv;
			    curdiv++;
			    if (curdiv>=alldiv.length) curdiv=0;
				$(alldiv[olddiv]).removeAttr( "style" ).fadeOut();
				runEffect(curdiv);
			}, 5000 );
		};
    if(alldiv.length>1){        
        runEffect(curdiv)
    }else{
        var options = { percent: 100 };
        $( alldiv[curdiv] ).show( "blind", options, 500);
    }
</script>

     <script type="text/javascript">
	var allinput= $('.realcontent').find('input,textarea');
	$(allinput).each(function(){
		$(this).attr('rel',$(this).attr('title'));
		$(this).attr('title','');
		if ($(this).val()==$(this).attr('rel') || $(this).val()==''){
			$(this).val($(this).attr('rel'));
			$(this).css('color','#777');
		}else{
			$(this).css('color','#333');
		}
	});
	$(allinput).focus(function(){
		$(this).css('color','#333');
		if ($(this).val()==$(this).attr('rel')){
	 		$(this).val('');			
		}
	 });
	 $(allinput).blur(function(){
		if ($(this).val()==''){
	 		$(this).val($(this).attr('rel'));
			$(this).css('color','#777');
		}
	 });
	 $('#theclear').click(function(){
	 	$(allinput).each(function(){
			$(this).val($(this).attr('rel'));
			$(this).css('color','#777');
		});
	 });
</script>
